Integration for AI
 

Building intelligent digital experiences such as GenAI applications, RAG applications, and AI agents requires integrating AI capabilities into the digital experiences you build, making integration a foundational component of building a modern, AI-native business.

 

Build GenAI applications

Easily integrate to GenAI models, add intelligence to your applications, and build GenAI applications.

Build RAG applications

Building RAG applications has never been easier. From provisioning vector databases, to populating them using no-code pipelines, all it takes is a few clicks. These knowledge bases can then be integrated into your workflows with low-code, allowing you to quickly build intelligent digital experiences that are grounded in your organization’s data.

Build a RAG application.

Build AI agents

Building AI agents is more of an integration problem than an AI problem, and your agent is only as good as the data it can access.

Build AI agents using WSO2’s agent framework, combined with a wide array of connectors for seamless integration with any system. Utilize protocols like MCP, GraphQL, REST, and WebSocket to make data available to your agents, ensuring that they always have access to the information they require.

Build an AI agent.

AI for Integration

AI assistance at every stage of the development process enhances the development experience, increasing productivity by over 50%, accelerating time-to-market by over 40%, and making integration development faster, easier, and better.

AI-assisted development

Describe your integration requirements in natural language, and our copilot will automatically generate your integrations for you.

Receive context-aware code suggestions as you add constructs, as well as a natural-language interactive development experience.

AI-assisted data mapping

Map data faster, and more precisely and reliably using AI to automatically align data fields between source and target systems, and suggest mappings.

Upload documents to provide additional knowledge, and assist the data mapping.

Automated test case generation

Automatically create test cases, ensuring comprehensive validation of integration flows.

Automated documentation

Automatically generate user documentation from your code, making it easier for users to learn and use your APIs.

Go further by generating internal documentation from the code design as well, helping your team bootstrap projects faster, and work more productively.
